items

Class GemInventory.Gem

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.GemInventory.Gem
  • Enclosing class:
    GemInventory

    public class GemInventory.Gem
extends java.lang.Object
    Gem is the class used to represent a singular Gem. A Gem is a combination of a value of the Gem, which could be positive or negative, and a the type of weapon it can enhance.
    Version:
    2.0.0.0
    Author:
    Lev Raizman

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int value
      The value provided by the Gem.
      private boolean weapon
      The type of weapon the Gem supports.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gem

        public Gem(int value,
           boolean type)
        Constructs the Gem using all needed values.
        Parameters:
        value - the boost granted by the Gem
        type - true if for weapon, false if for shield

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns:
        The boost of the Gem.

      • getType

        public boolean getType()
        Returns:
        True if this Gem enhances a weapon, false if this Gem enhances a shield.

      • drawGem

        public java.awt.Image drawGem()
        Creates an image of the Gem and returns it.

        The Gem is green if it has a positive value, red if negative. The Gem is a square if it supports a weapon, a circle if it supports a shield.

        Returns:
        An image of the current Gem.
